td.content: s:a 36 yr old male sound engineer with C/O Heart for 3 days that is frequent. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 60.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:male sound engineer aged 36 ys presents with 7 weeks history of worsening Heart. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 61.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered Pericardiocentesis - pericardial space.
